data.1: WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,
data.2: And the earth throws out its burdens,
data.3: And man enquires: "What has come over it?"
data.4: That day it will narrate its annals,
data.5: For your Lord will have commanded it.
data.6: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.
data.7: Whosoever has done even an atom´s weight of good will behold it;
data.8: And whosoever has done even an atom´s weight of evil will behold that.
